word_mean: 由地球上看到内行星与太阳的黄经相差９０°的现象。也指此现象发生的时刻。

sentence.Network_en: A half moon is visible at the quadrature of the moon.
sentence.Network_cn: 半形月在月弦的地方可以看得见.

sentence.Network_en: A neat solution of the quadrature problem can be achieved with the spiral of Archimedes.
sentence.Network_cn: 用阿基米德螺线能成功地解决化圆为方的问题,方法很简单.

sentence.Network_en: If the coefficients 1, then we call a positive quadrature formula.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果系数1, 然后我们称之为积极的求积公式.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (as a mathematical term): from Latin quadratura 'a square, squaring', from quadrare (see quadrate)

means.word_mean: 1. the construction of a square having the same area as some other figure
